import React, { useState } from 'react' import Navbar from '../../components/Navbar' import AdminPanel from '../../components/AdminPanel' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Footer from '../../components/Footer'; const AdminDashboard = () => { const [message, setMessage] = useState("Hello World"); const [customers, setCustomers] = useState([ { } ]); const total_revenue = 1500.99; const available_fabric = 650; const average_service_time = { days: 7, hours: 24 } const invoice_data = [ { total: 500, sum: 100 } ] return ( <>

Admin Dashboard

{message}

Total Customers

{customers.length}

Details

Revenue Generated

KWD {new Intl.NumberFormat("en-US").format(total_revenue)}

Details

Total Fabric

{available_fabric} meters

Details

Average Service Time

{`${average_service_time.days.toFixed(2)} "day(s)," average_service_time.hours.toFixed(2) "hours"}`}

Details

Invoice Data

{`${invoice_data.length ? invoice_data[0].total : 0} "created"}`}

{`${invoice_data.length ? invoice_data[0].sum : 0} "deleted"}`}

Details
) } export default AdminDashboard
